welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Swinton, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful countryside. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newly renovated terminal primarily used for long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
